department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada in Yellowknife, NWT, has a requirement for the supply of all labour, materials, equipment, transportation and supervision required for the provision of Garbage Removal Services.
full_summary:
# Public Works and Government Services Canada - Garbage Removal Services
----------

[Tender Title]: Garbage Removal Services
[Reference Number]: PW-NCS-073-12329
[Amendment Number]: 2
[Solicitation Number]: EW076-230678/A
[Publish Date]: October 13, 2022
[Tender Closing Date]: November 8, 2022, 4:00 p.m. local time
[Contract Closing Date]: None

## Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites you to tender for the supply of Garbage Removal Services in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories.

### Nature of Work:

- The Contractor is required to supply all the necessary labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and supervision for garbage removal services within the city limits of Yellowknife.

- The services will be performed during regular business hours, unless otherwise requested by the Project Authority or authorized representative.

- The Contractor must obtain permission to access the site from the project authority or the authorized representative.

### Delivery Requirements:

- The contract does not specify a delivery date.

### Submission Requirements:

- Interested suppliers may submit a proposal for the contract.

- Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on the terms and conditions of the contract.

### Notice of Amendment:

- Amendment Number 2 to this Notice of Tender was issued on October 31, 2022.

### Trade Agreements:
Trade Agreement: LCSA/CFTA.

### Solicitation Process:
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid.

### Notice of Interest:

If you are interested in this tender, you must submit a request for access to the solicitation documents through the Canada À Buys portal by contacting Onwuama Ezechinedu, Consultant, at (587) 341-0132 or by email at [Nkechi.OnwuamaEzechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Nkechi.OnwuamaEzechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).  Log in with your Business Number.
### Address for mentioning
Trade agreements offered LCSA/CFTA 
Regions for intervention Northwest territory
